h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 5 Secret Area
h3_title: The Dead Cart in Furnance Valley
content: The next place you'll go to is the Furnace Valley Entrance. When you get down to where the lava is, you can find a cart along a path to the right. **You do not need to do anything to this path to reveal the secret area in Chapter 5. This cart is related to Man Tianba's (the Horse Guai) questline.** If you want to complete this, interact with this BEFORE you fight against Keeper of the Flaming Mountains. After the Keeper of the Flaming Mountain boss fight, return to the cart and pull the string to get the Dark Thunder Transformation Spell.
